Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: The Imperial Station Captain was a female Human in the Imperial Military of the reconstituted Sith Empire who commanded the space station Korriban's Flame during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. A fair-skinned woman with brown eyes, the captain wore the dark gray dress uniform of an Imperial officer, complete with a small hat, and wielded two powerful blaster pistols in combat. Around 3640 BBY, the Dark Jedi Leeha Narezz lured the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython to the Korriban's Flame as part of a plan to trap the Jedi, and the captain was among those Imperials who fell to the Knight's blade while attempting to defend the station.
The Station Captain first appeared in the Jedi Knight class mission "Fallen" in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
